scripts.build: concurrently "cd client && npm run build" "cd api && npm run build"
scripts.clean: concurrently "rimraf node_modules" "cd client && rimraf node_modules build" "cd api && rimraf node_modules build"
scripts.install: (cd client && npm install) && (cd api && npm install)
scripts.start: concurrently "cd client && PORT=3000 npm run start" "cd api && PORT=8080 npm run start"
